jobDescription: Seeking Network Engineer to design, implement, and maintain computer networks. Requires a strong understanding of network protocols, security, and infrastructure, as well as experience in designing, developing, and maintaining computer hardware and software systems. Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field preferred.
responsibility: Perform testing and debugging of computer systems, Evaluate system performance and recommend improvements, Collaborate with other engineers to ensure compatibility of different system components, Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and trends in computer engineering
requirement: Complete BSc degree from any reputable university.
